general: Sensor: 1/4” CMOS Sensor Board Lens Focal Length: 4 mm F/No: 1.5 Minimum illumination: 0 lux Focus Depth: 20 cm ~ infinity View: Digital Zoom: 4x Horizontal: 51.8° Vertical: 33.8° Diagonal: 59.6°
